name.japanese: リトル・イーストブルー

description: An island village in the Grand Line that recreates various famous locations from the East Blue sea. The residents built replicas of places like Foosha Village's windmill, Shimotsuki Village's dojo, Syrup Village's mansion, and the Baratie restaurant to honor their East Blue homeland.

keyEvents.title: Straw Hats Arrive at Little East Blue
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hat Pirates arrive at Little East Blue and discover the nostalgic recreations of their East Blue origins.
keyEvents.significance: Introduces the setting for the Little East Blue arc and establishes the island's unique characteristic of recreating East Blue locations.

keyEvents.title: Amigo Pirates Attack Little East Blue
keyEvents.description: The Amigo Pirates surface at Little East Blue seeking to capture Boss the beetle, threatening the peaceful island.
keyEvents.significance: Little East Blue becomes the battleground for the arc's main conflict.

statusHistory.reason: Little East Blue is an active, inhabited island

notes: Little East Blue is an anime-only location created for the Little East Blue arc as a tie-in to One Piece Film: Strong World. The island serves as a nostalgic tribute to the East Blue, the sea where most of the Straw Hat crew originated.
